verses.verse: And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H4729>burn<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H7848>upon<s%>: of acacia <S%H6086>wood<s%> shall you make <S%H6213>it<s%>.

A <S%H520>cubit<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> there and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> there <S%H7251>foursquare<s%> shall it <S%H520>be<s%>: and two cubits shall be the <S%H6967>height<s%> there the horns there shall be of the <S%H7161>same<s%>.

And you shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, the <S%H1406>top<s%> there and the <S%H7023>sides<s%> there round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and the <S%H7161>horns<s%> there and you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> unto it a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> to it under the <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H8147>it<s%>, by the two <S%H6763>corners<s%> there upon the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6654>sides<s%> of it shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H1004>it<s%>; and they shall be for places for the <S%H905>poles<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> it <S%H1992>withal<s%>.
And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> that is by the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> that is over the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, where I will meet with <S%H3259>you<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> on it <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> every <S%H1242>morning<s%>: when he <S%H3190>dresses<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%>, he shall burn incense upon <S%H6999>it<s%>.

And when <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5927>lights<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>, he shall burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> upon <S%H8548>it<s%>, a perpetual <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

You shall <S%H5927>offer<s%> no <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> on it nor burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice<s%>, nor food <S%H4503>offering<s%>; neither shall you <S%H5258>pour<s%> drink offering on <S%H5262>it<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> upon the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of it <S%H259>once<s%> in a <S%H8141>year<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> of <S%H3725>atonements<s%>: <S%H259>once<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> shall he make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> upon it throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>: it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

When you <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> after their <S%H6485>number<s%>, then shall they <S%H5414>give<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> a <S%H3724>ransom<s%> for his <S%H5315>soul<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, when you <S%H6485>numberest<s%> <S%H5063>them<s%>; that there be no plague among <S%H6485>them<s%>, when you numberest them.

This they shall <S%H5414>give<s%>, every one that <S%H5674>passes<s%> <S%H5921>among<s%> them that are <S%H6485>numbered<s%>, <S%H4276>half<s%> a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>: (a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs<s%>:) an <S%H4276>half<s%> <S%H8255>shekel<s%> shall be the <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Every one that <S%H5674>passes<s%> among them that are <S%H6485>numbered<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>above<s%>, shall <S%H5414>give<s%> an <S%H8641>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

The <S%H6223>rich<s%> shall not give <S%H7235>more<s%>, and the <S%H1800>poor<s%> shall not give <S%H4591>less<s%> than <S%H4276>half<s%> a <S%H8255>shekel<s%>, when they <S%H5414>give<s%> an <S%H8641>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for your <S%H5315>souls<s%>.

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H3725>atonement<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and shall <S%H5414>appoint<s%> it for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>; that it may be a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for your <S%H5315>souls<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

You shall also <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H3595>basin<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and his <S%H3653>foot<s%> also of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, to <S%H7364>wash<s%> <S%H5414>with<s%>: and you shall put it between the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> water in <S%H4325>it<s%>
For <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their feet <S%H7272>there<s%>.

When they <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, they shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%>, that they <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H5066>not<s%>; or when they come near to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%>, to burn <S%H6999>offering<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>:

So they shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their <S%H7272>feet<s%>, that they <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H2706>not<s%>: and it shall be a statute for <S%H5769>ever<s%> to <S%H2233>them<s%>, even to him and to his seed throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
Moreover the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H3947>Take<s%> you also unto you <S%H7218>principal<s%> <S%H1314>spices<s%>, of <S%H1865>pure<s%> <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H1314>shekels<s%>, and of sweet <S%H7076>cinnamon<s%> <S%H4276>half<s%> so <S%H4276>much<s%>, even two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H1314>shekels<s%>, and of sweet <S%H7070>cane<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and fifty <S%H2572>shekels<s%>,
And of <S%H6916>cassia<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>, after the shekel of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, and of <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> a <S%H1969>hin<s%>:

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> it an <S%H8081>oil<s%> of <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>ointment<s%>, an <S%H7545>ointment<s%> <S%H4842>compound<s%> after the <S%H4639>art<s%> of the <S%H7543>apothecary<s%>: it shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>.
And you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H727>therewith<s%>, and the ark of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>,
And the <S%H7979>table<s%> and all his <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> and his <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%>,
And the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> with all his <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and the <S%H3595>basin<s%> and his <S%H3653>foot<s%>.
And you shall <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H6944>them<s%>, that they may be most <S%H6944>holy<s%>: whatever <S%H5060>touches<s%> them shall be <S%H6942>holy<s%>.
And you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> <S%H3547>them<s%>, that they may minister unto me in the priest's office.

And you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> unto me throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

Upon <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall it not be <S%H3251>poured<s%>, neither shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> any other like <S%H4971>it<s%>, after the composition of <S%H6944>it<s%>: it is holy, and it shall be holy unto <S%H6944>you<s%>.
<S%H834>Whoever<s%> <S%H7543>compounds<s%> any like <S%H5414>it<s%>, or whoever puts any of it upon a <S%H2114>stranger<s%>, shall even be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> unto you sweet <S%H5561>spices<s%>, <S%H5198>stacte<s%>, and <S%H7827>onycha<s%>, and <S%H2464>galbanum<s%>; these <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H5561>spices<s%> with <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense<s%>: of <S%H905>each<s%> shall there be a like <S%H905>weight<s%>:

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> it a <S%H7004>perfume<s%>, a <S%H7545>confection<s%> after the <S%H4639>are<s%> of the <S%H7543>apothecary<s%>, <S%H4414>tempered<s%> <S%H2889>together<s%>, pure and <S%H6944>holy<s%>:

And you shall <S%H7833>beat<s%> some of it very <S%H1854>small<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> of it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, where I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with you it shall be unto you <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>.

And as for the <S%H7004>perfume<s%> which you shall <S%H6213>make<s%>, you shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> to yourselves according to the <S%H4971>composition<s%> there it shall be unto you <S%H6944>holy<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
<S%H834>Whoever<s%> shall <S%H6213>make<s%> like unto <S%H7306>that<s%>, to smell like <S%H3772>it<s%>, shall even be cut off from his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
